short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy extension for taking notes and saving important articles.
short.fr: Une extension pratique pour prendre des notes et sauvegarder des articles importants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The “SnapReadEase” extension gives you two essential features to improve your browsing experience. First, it lets you keep a notepad handy, ideal for jotting down ideas, to-do lists, or important information while you browse the web.

Then, the Quick URL Save feature allows you to store important web links for future reference in one click. 

You can disable one of these features if you wish, for more control over your browsing experience.

Why you should install it:

-Improved efficiency: No more juggling multiple apps or tabs to take notes or save links. Everything is integrated directly into your browser.

-Increased Productivity: Never miss a brilliant idea or important link again. Save them quickly and find them easily.

-Customization: Enable or disable features according to your preferences. You are in control.

Be more productive, organize yourself efficiently and always keep important information close at hand with “SnapReadEase”.
